Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-orange pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and faint traces of five (?) lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393877) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393877)
